description: A swordswoman who has a dog deity (inugami) living inside her, and as a result, is despised by humans. She saved Tokidoki from the Nue. At first, she hates optimistic and naive people like Tokidoki, but she warms up to him throughout the course of the series. She usually wears her hair in a long ponytail, and has a big appetite.
name: Kuchiha
